<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 3.2//EN">
<HTML>

<HEAD>
	<TITLE>untitled</TITLE>
</HEAD>

<BODY>

Here is a broken link: <a href="NonExistent1.html">broken</a> since the linked file is not there..

Here is a broken link: <a href="http://wwwww.non-existent-domain.commmm">broken</a> to a non-existent website.

Here is a good link: <a href="http://java.sun.com">ok</a> to a website.

Here is a good link: <a href="ExampleTopic.html">ok</a> to a file.

Here is a good image <img src="Red.png">.

Here is an image that we regard as a broken link due to the uppercase extension <img src="Red.PNG">.

Here is a non-existent image <img src="Puce.png">.

</BODY>

</HTML>
